content: ï»¿ Panagiotis Tsiotras Home | People | Research | Publications | Software | Links | News | Contact Contact info Email: tsiotras@gatech.edu Office: Office 415-C, Montgomery Knight Building Phone: (404) 894-9526 Fax: (404) 894-2760 Panagiotis Tsiotras David and Andrew Lewis Endowed Chair Professor Director of the Dynamics and Control Systems Laboratory School of Aerospace Engineering Georgia Institute of Technology Atlanta, GA 30332-0150 Education Ph.D.('93'), Aeronautics & Astronautics, Purdue University M.Sc.('92'), Mathematics, Purdue University M.Sc.('87'), Aerospace Engineering, Virginia Tech Eng.Dipl.('86'), Mechanical Engineering, National Technical University, Athens, Greece Extended CV Research interests My current research interests are in the area of dynamics and control for nonlinear systems, emphasizing mechanical and aerospace applications and vehicle autonomy. Information on past and current research projects can be found in the Dynamics and Control Systems website.
